org.terrier.matching.models

Class StaticFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.matching.models.WeightingModel
      • org.terrier.matching.models.StaticScoreModifierWeightingModel
        • org.terrier.matching.models.StaticFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Model

    public class StaticFeature
extends StaticScoreModifierWeightingModel
    Class for query independent features loaded from file. See StaticScoreModifierWeightingModel for supported input file formats.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
